entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
